offset.description: The number of rows to skip from the top of the sheet.

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetGetMany request property "offset" should be a number.

limit.description: The maximum number of rows to fetch.

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetGetMany request property "limit" should be a number.

filter.description: A MongoDB query expression to filter the data.

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetGetMany request property "filter" should be an object.

pipeline.description: A MongoDB aggregation pipeline to transform the data.

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetGetMany request property "pipeline" should be an array.
GoogleSheetGetMany request properties should be an object.
